CancelKeyDeletion.name: CancelKeyDeletion
CancelKeyDeletion.description: Controls permission to cancel the scheduled deletion of a customer master key.

ConnectCustomKeyStore.name: ConnectCustomKeyStore
ConnectCustomKeyStore.description:
Controls permission to connect or reconnect a custom key store to its associated AWS
                                                CloudHSM cluster.

CreateAlias.name: CreateAlias
CreateAlias.description:
Controls permission to create an alias for a customer master key (CMK). Aliases are
                                                optional friendly names that you can associate with customer master keys.

CreateCustomKeyStore.name: CreateCustomKeyStore
CreateCustomKeyStore.description:
Controls permission to create a custom key store that is associated with an AWS CloudHSM
                                                cluster that you own and manage.

CreateGrant.name: CreateGrant
CreateGrant.description:
Controls permission to add a grant to a customer master key. You can use grants to
                                                add permissions without changing the key policy or IAM policy.

CreateKey.name: CreateKey
CreateKey.description:
Controls permission to create a customer master key that can be used to protect data
                                                keys and other sensitive information.

Decrypt.name: Decrypt
Decrypt.description:
Controls permission to decrypt ciphertext that was encrypted under a customer master
                                                key.

DeleteAlias.name: DeleteAlias
DeleteAlias.description:
Controls permission to delete an alias. Aliases are optional friendly names that you
                                                can associate with customer master keys.

DeleteCustomKeyStore.name: DeleteCustomKeyStore
DeleteCustomKeyStore.description: Controls permission to delete a custom key store.

DeleteImportedKeyMaterial.name: DeleteImportedKeyMaterial
DeleteImportedKeyMaterial.description:
Controls permission to delete cryptographic material that you imported into a customer
                                                master key. This action makes the key unusable.

DescribeCustomKeyStores.name: DescribeCustomKeyStores
DescribeCustomKeyStores.description:
Controls permission to view detailed information about custom key stores in the account
                                                and region.

DescribeKey.name: DescribeKey
DescribeKey.description: Controls permission to view detailed information about a customer master key.

DisableKey.name: DisableKey
DisableKey.description:
Controls permission to disable a customer master key, which prevents it from being
                                                used in cryptographic operations.

DisableKeyRotation.name: DisableKeyRotation
DisableKeyRotation.description:
Controls permission to disable automatic rotation of a customer managed customer master
                                                key.

DisconnectCustomKeyStore.name: DisconnectCustomKeyStore
DisconnectCustomKeyStore.description:
Controls permission to disconnect the custom key store from its associated AWS CloudHSM
                                                cluster.

EnableKey.name: EnableKey
EnableKey.description:
Controls permission to change the state of a customer master key (CMK) to enabled.
                                                This allows the CMK to be used in cryptographic operations.

EnableKeyRotation.name: EnableKeyRotation
EnableKeyRotation.description:
Controls permission to enable automatic rotation of the cryptographic material in
                                                a customer master key.

Encrypt.name: Encrypt
Encrypt.description:
Controls permission to use the specified customer master key to encrypt data and data
                                                keys.

GenerateDataKey.name: GenerateDataKey
GenerateDataKey.description:
Controls permission to use the customer master key to generate data keys. You can
                                                use the data keys to encrypt data outside of AWS KMS.

GenerateDataKeyPair.name: GenerateDataKeyPair
GenerateDataKeyPair.description: Controls permission to use the customer master key to generate data key pairs.

GenerateDataKeyPairWithoutPlaintext.name: GenerateDataKeyPairWithoutPlaintext
GenerateDataKeyPairWithoutPlaintext.description:
Controls permission to use the customer master key to generate data key pairs. Unlike
                                                the GenerateDataKeyPair operation, this operation returns an encrypted private key
                                                without a plaintext copy.

GenerateDataKeyWithoutPlaintext.name: GenerateDataKeyWithoutPlaintext
GenerateDataKeyWithoutPlaintext.description:
Controls permission to use the customer master key to generate a data key. Unlike
                                                the GenerateDataKey operation, this operation returns an encrypted data key without
                                                a plaintext version of the data key.

GenerateRandom.name: GenerateRandom
GenerateRandom.description:
Controls permission to get a cryptographically secure random byte string from AWS
                                                KMS.

GetKeyPolicy.name: GetKeyPolicy
GetKeyPolicy.description: Controls permission to view the key policy for the specified customer master key.

GetKeyRotationStatus.name: GetKeyRotationStatus
GetKeyRotationStatus.description:
Controls permission to determine whether automatic key rotation is enabled on the
                                                customer master key.

GetParametersForImport.name: GetParametersForImport
GetParametersForImport.description:
Controls permission to get data that is required to import cryptographic material
                                                into a customer managed key, including a public key and import token.

GetPublicKey.name: GetPublicKey
GetPublicKey.description: Controls permission to download the public key of an asymmetric customer master key.

ImportKeyMaterial.name: ImportKeyMaterial
ImportKeyMaterial.description: Controls permission to import cryptographic material into a customer master key.

ListAliases.name: ListAliases
ListAliases.description:
Controls permission to view the aliases that are defined in the account. Aliases are
                                                optional friendly names that you can associate with customer master keys.

ListGrants.name: ListGrants
ListGrants.description: Controls permission to view all grants for a customer master key.

ListKeyPolicies.name: ListKeyPolicies
ListKeyPolicies.description: Controls permission to view the names of key policies for a customer master key.

ListKeys.name: ListKeys
ListKeys.description:
Controls permission to view the key ID and Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of all customer
                                                master keys in the account.

ListResourceTags.name: ListResourceTags
ListResourceTags.description: Controls permission to view all tags that are attached to a customer master key.

ListRetirableGrants.name: ListRetirableGrants
ListRetirableGrants.description:
Controls permission to view grants in which the specified principal is the retiring
                                                principal. Other principals might be able to retire the grant and this principal might
                                                be able to retire other grants.

PutKeyPolicy.name: PutKeyPolicy
PutKeyPolicy.description: Controls permission to replace the key policy for the specified customer master key.

ReEncryptFrom.name: ReEncryptFrom
ReEncryptFrom.description:
Controls permission to decrypt data as part of the process that decrypts and reencrypts
                                                the data within AWS KMS.

ReEncryptTo.name: ReEncryptTo
ReEncryptTo.description:
Controls permission to encrypt data as part of the process that decrypts and reencrypts
                                                the data within AWS KMS.

RetireGrant.name: RetireGrant
RetireGrant.description:
Controls permission to retire a grant. The RetireGrant operation is typically called
                                                by the grant user after they complete the tasks that the grant allowed them to perform.

RevokeGrant.name: RevokeGrant
RevokeGrant.description:
Controls permission to revoke a grant, which denies permission for all operations
                                                that depend on the grant.

ScheduleKeyDeletion.name: ScheduleKeyDeletion
ScheduleKeyDeletion.description: Controls permission to schedule deletion of a customer master key.

Sign.name: Sign
Sign.description: Controls permission to produce a digital signature for a message.

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description:
Controls permission to create or update tags that are attached to a customer master
                                                key.

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Controls permission to delete tags that are attached to a customer master key.

UpdateAlias.name: UpdateAlias
UpdateAlias.description:
Controls permission to associate an alias with a different customer master key. An
                                                alias is an optional friendly name that you can associate with a customer master key.

UpdateCustomKeyStore.name: UpdateCustomKeyStore
UpdateCustomKeyStore.description: Controls permission to change the properties of a custom key store.

UpdateKeyDescription.name: UpdateKeyDescription
UpdateKeyDescription.description: Controls permission to delete or change the description of a customer master key.

Verify.name: Verify
Verify.description: Controls permission to use the specified customer master key to verify digital signatures.
